amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the appropriation for new fixed guideway systems by $93 million and strike 15 new fixed guideway projects.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, not preprinted in the Congressional record, to prohibit the expenditure of funds appropriated for mass transit grants for new light rail mass transit projects that have not previously received appropriations. The intent of the amendment is to reduce funds available for mass transit grants by $93 million by prohibiting construction of 15 new light rail projects.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (MI) amendment (A008) Failed by voice vote.
